price: Yoo duutan yookiin ajjeefamtanis, dhugumatti isin garuma Rabbiitti walitti qabamtu.
arabic: وَلَئِن مُّتُّمۡ أَوۡ قُتِلۡتُمۡ لَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wala-in muttum aw qutil'tum la-ilā al-lahi tuḥ'sharūna
